name: n8n-nodes-base.merge
semantic_context: Merges data of multiple streams once data from both is available

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice

mode.name: mode

options.name: Append
options.description: Combines data of both inputs. The output will contain items of input 1 and input 2.

options.name: Keep Key Matches
options.description: Keeps data of input 1 if it does find a match with data of input 2

options.name: Merge By Index
options.description: Merges data of both inputs. The output will contain items of input 1 merged with data of input 2. Merge happens depending on the index of the items. So first item of input 1 will be merged with first item of input 2 and so on.

options.name: Merge By Key
options.description: Merges data of both inputs. The output will contain items of input 1 merged with data of input 2. Merge happens depending on a defined key.

options.name: Multiplex
options.description: Merges each value of one input with each value of the other input. The output will contain (m * n) items where (m) and (n) are lengths of the inputs.

options.name: Pass-Through
options.description: Passes through data of one input. The output will contain only items of the defined input.

options.name: Remove Key Matches
options.description: Keeps data of input 1 if it does NOT find match with data of input 2

options.name: Wait
options.description: Waits till data of both inputs is available and will then output a single empty item. Source Nodes must connect to both Input 1 and 2. This node only supports 2 Sources, if you need more Sources, connect multiple Merge nodes in series. This node will not output any data.

mode.description: How data of branches should be merged
mode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

join.name: join

options.name: Inner Join
options.description: Merges as many items as both inputs contain. (Example: Input1 = 5 items, Input2 = 3 items | Output will contain 3 items).

options.name: Left Join
options.description: Merges as many items as first input contains. (Example: Input1 = 3 items, Input2 = 5 items | Output will contain 3 items).

options.name: Outer Join
options.description: Merges as many items as input contains with most items. (Example: Input1 = 3 items, Input2 = 5 items | Output will contain 5 items).

join.description: How many items the output will contain if inputs contain different amount of items
join.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

propertyName1.name: propertyName1
propertyName1.hint: The name of the field as text (e.g. “id”)
propertyName1.description: Name of property which decides which items to merge of input 1
propertyName1.ai_hint: Name of property which decides which items to merge of input 1

propertyName2.name: propertyName2
propertyName2.hint: The name of the field as text (e.g. “id”)
propertyName2.description: Name of property which decides which items to merge of input 2
propertyName2.ai_hint: Name of property which decides which items to merge of input 2

output.name: output
output.description: Defines of which input the data should be used as output of node
output.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

overwrite.name: overwrite

options.name: If Blank
options.description: Overwrites only values of "null", "undefined" or empty string

options.name: If Missing
options.description: Only adds values which do not exist yet

overwrite.description: Select when to overwrite the values from Input1 with values from Input 2
overwrite.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

conditional_rules: IF mode IN ["keepKeyMatches", "mergeByKey", "removeKeyMatches"] THEN SHOW parameter 'propertyName1'
IF mode IN ["keepKeyMatches", "mergeByKey", "removeKeyMatches"] THEN SHOW parameter 'propertyName2'
